SELECT gu.* FROM `grss_user_community` guc,`grss_user` gu WHERE guc.`user_id` = gu.`user_id` AND guc.`community_id` = #{communityId}
select * from grss_user gu where gu.status = 3 and IFNULL(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,gu.apply_coach_date,now()),0) >= 20;

SELECT model.*, gc.club_id, gc.club_name, gco.id, gco. NAME, gco.price FROM grss_user model LEFT JOIN grss_club_coach gcc ON gcc.user_id = model.user_id LEFT JOIN grss_club gc ON gcc.club_id = gc.club_id LEFT JOIN grss_course gco ON gco.coach_id = model.user_id WHERE model.user_id=#{userId}
select * from grss_user gu where gu.status != 2

select gu.* from grss_user gu LEFT JOIN ( SELECT be_noticed_id,count(1) fs_count from grss_follow group by be_noticed_id) as fs_data ON gu.user_id=fs_data.be_noticed_id where `status`=1 order by fs_data.fs_count DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}
